sentences.en: At the summit the stamina and valor of our fighter pilots remained unconquerable and supreme.
sentences.cn: 最突出的是,我们的战斗机飞行员们始终保持着不可战胜的最大的毅力和勇气.

sentences.en: Click here for the Valor article in Sport Pilot magazine.
sentences.cn: 点击此处查看条在体育运动中英勇试点杂志.

sentences.en: Fortitude is distinct from valor .
sentences.cn: 刚毅与勇猛不同。

sentences.en: Fortitude is distinct from valor.
sentences.cn: 坚韧不拔有别于勇猛。

sentences.en: Frequently banality is the better parts of valor.
sentences.cn: 老生常谈往往比大胆打破常规更为人称道.

sentences.en: He received a medal for valor.
sentences.cn: 他因为英勇而获得一枚奖章.

sentences.en: I am valor.
sentences.cn: 我是勇猛。

sentences.en: It's the same valor that endured the stinging cold of Valley Forge.
sentences.cn: 这是忍受谷伪造刺痛的寒冷的同样勇气.

sentences.en: Part of that responsibility is making sure that we honor our commitments to those who have served our country with such valor.
sentences.cn: 这种职责的一部分是要确保我们履行对那些一直以这样的英勇帮助我们的那些国家的承诺。

sentences.en: Performers can fully demonstrate their valor and heroic spirit.
sentences.cn: 激励着表演者展示骑手的英姿,自由发挥,尽情欢舞.

sentences.en: The captain is always boasting of his military valor.
sentences.cn: 上尉老是自夸阵前之勇.

sentences.en: The commander decided that discretion is the better part of valor.
sentences.cn: 指挥官决定不作无所谓的冒险.

sentences.en: The troops showed great valor .
sentences.cn: 军队表现出极大的英勇。

sentences.en: The troops showed great valor.
sentences.cn: 军队表现出极大的英勇.

sentences.en: They owed their lives to the valor of the firemen.
sentences.cn: 他们将其生命归功于消防员的英勇。 英勇。

sentences.en: They owned their lives to the valor of the fireman.
sentences.cn: 由于消防队员们的勇敢,他们才保住了生命.

sentences.en: This honour was conferred upon them in intuition to their valor.
sentences.cn: 他们因为英勇而获得此项荣誉.

sentences.en: Wherever true valor is found , true modesty will there abound.
sentences.cn: 真正的勇敢, 都包含谦虚.

sentences.en: With characteristic rashness and valor, Peter plunged into the icy water.
sentences.cn: 以他惯有的冲动和勇气，彼得一头扎进了冰冷的水中。

sentences.en: Your music and oratory inspire your allies to greater deeds of valor.
sentences.cn: 你的音乐与言辞激励你的盟友做出更加伟大的勇敢行为.
